text:
@realDonaldTrump You don't even pretend to lead, you don't even pretend to unite, you don't even pretend to take any responsibility, you don't even pretend to empathize with the families of coronavirus victims or death-by-cop.

On November 3rd, vote for Joe Biden. Vote for sanity and humanity.
